value:
Do none of you members of the Order
of Heroes use staves to support others
in battle? Then I'll double my efforts!

My retainers are Hana and Subaki,
both equally strong and reliable.
Th-they're almost too good for me!

Are you checking on the others?
So was I. It's important to make sure
that everyone's doing all right.

I'm pretty fond of sweets. If you see
any sweetshops around, please
let me know right away!

Sorry, I was just practicing. I really
want to be as useful as all my
older siblings are in battle.

Why, hello! I come with greetings
from $Nf!
Now I can really do my part!
That was nice! Every bit helps.

Oh, my! I'll just need to try
harder.

You've made me stronger? Thank
you so much!

I'm a princess from the Kingdom of
Hoshido. But, please, call me
Sakura. I'm delighted to help you!

Oh! Thank you so very much
for checking up on me,
$Nu.$k$pI'm doing well, but may I tell you
something? When I first got here,
I wasn't sure how to act around you.$k$pThey call you a Great Hero, so I
thought I should respect such a
great person by keeping my distance.$k$pBut then I got to know you.
You're so kind and put everyone
at ease—most of all, me.$k$pIt's almost like you've become a
part of my family. I mean, here we
are now, simply chatting.$k$pS-so now...I have s-something to
ask you. Would you consider
thinking of m-me...$k$pas a friend?$k$pWhat? You already do? Why, that's
wonderful! I am so glad you
summoned me into your life.$k$pI promise to help you any way
that I can...friend!
はいっ
それっ
きゃあっ！
どうしましょう…！
It's all me!
Don't come any closer!
Excuse me!
Sorry about this!
Don't be sad...
Heehee...
I'll do my best for you!
Please, take care!
I'm still finding my voice...but I like speaking with you!
This realm is so beautiful, much like my homeland, Hoshido.
I hope to grow every bit as strong as my siblings.
Have you seen my retainers? Hana? Or Subaki?
I'd like to learn everything about this realm. And...you too.
Yes?
As you wish.
Let's go.
